{"step_by_step_thinking": "Fibrin is a protein that forms a mesh-like structure in blood clots, so it doesn't cause lysis of clots. Hyaluronidase is an enzyme that breaks down hyaluronic acid, not clots. Coagulase is an enzyme that promotes clotting, not lysis of clots. Plasmin is an enzyme that breaks down fibrin in blood clots, leading to clot lysis.", "answer_choice": "B. Plasmin"}
